flawed_nl_solution:
50cm³ will make one balloon touch the ceiling so 1800cm³ will make 1800/50 = <<1800/50=36.0>>36.0 balloons touch the ceiling
There are 50 balloons in total so 50-36.0 = <<50-36.0=14.0>>14.0 balloons will not float since they were filled with ordinary air
There are 36.0-14.0 = <<36.0-14.0=27.0>>27.0 more balloons touching the ceiling than not

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 22.0, not 27.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
